general.name: mos_target_sdss_dr17_specobj
general.description: This table contains the list of all SDSS optical spectra for a given data release, with associated parameters from the 2D and 1D pipelines for each. The table contains both the BOSS and SDSS spectrograph data. The database representation is derived from the flat file information described here: https://data.sdss.org/datamodel/files/SPECTRO_REDUX/specObj.html Note: the order of the columns in this documentation may not match the order of the columns in the database table.

surveys.name: BHM
surveys.description: An optical time-domain spectroscopic survey of quasars and X-ray sources

surveys.name: MWM
surveys.description: A time-domain, optical+IR spectroscopic survey of Milky Way stars of all types.

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another

specobjid.name: specobjid
specobjid.description: Unique database ID based on PLATE, MJD, FIBERID, RUN2D (same as SkyServer version)

bestobjid.name: bestobjid
bestobjid.description: Unique database ID of (recommended) position-based photometric match based on RUN, RERUN, CAMCOl, FIELD, ID (same as SkyServer version)

fluxobjid.name: fluxobjid
fluxobjid.description: Unique database ID of flux-based photometric match based on RUN, RERUN, CAMCOl, FIELD, ID (same as SkyServer version)

targetobjid.name: targetobjid
targetobjid.description: Unique database ID of targeting object based on RUN, RERUN, CAMCOl, FIELD, ID (same as SkyServer version)

plateid.name: plateid
plateid.description: Unique database ID of plate based on PLATE, MJD, RUN2D (same as SkyServer version)

scienceprimary.name: scienceprimary
scienceprimary.description: Set to 1 for primary observation of object, 0 otherwise

sdssprimary.name: sdssprimary
sdssprimary.description: Set to 1 for primary SDSS spectrograph observation of object, 0 otherwise

legacyprimary.name: legacyprimary
legacyprimary.description: Set to 1 for primary SDSS Legacy program observation of object, 0 otherwise

segueprimary.name: segueprimary
segueprimary.description: Set to 1 for primary SDSS SEGUE program observation of object (including SEGUE-1 and SEGUE-2), 0 otherwise

segue1primary.name: segue1primary
segue1primary.description: Set to 1 for primary SDSS SEGUE-1 program observation of object, 0 otherwise

segue2primary.name: segue2primary
segue2primary.description: Set to 1 for primary SDSS SEGUE-2 program observation of object, 0 otherwise

bossprimary.name: bossprimary
bossprimary.description: Set to 1 for primary BOSS spectrograph observation of object, 0 otherwise

bossspecobjid.name: bossspecobjid
bossspecobjid.description: Identification number internal to BOSS for SPECBOSS=1 objects

firstrelease.name: firstrelease
firstrelease.description: Name of first release this PLATE, MJD, FIBERID, RUN2D was associated with

survey.name: survey
survey.description: Survey that this object is part of

instrument.name: instrument
instrument.description: Instrument that this spectrum was observed with (SDSS or BOSS)

programname.name: programname
programname.description: Program within each survey that the plate was part of

chunk.name: chunk
chunk.description: Name of tiling chunk that this spectrum was tiled in (boss1, boss2, etc), important for tracking large-scale structure samples

platerun.name: platerun
platerun.description: Drilling run that this plate was drilled in

plate.name: plate
plate.description: Plate number (each plate corresponds to an actual plug plate)

tile.name: tile
tile.description: Tile number (each tile can have several plates drilled for it)

legacy_target1.name: legacy_target1
legacy_target1.description: Primary (science) target flags for SDSS-I and SDSS-II Legacy survey

legacy_target2.name: legacy_target2
legacy_target2.description: Secondary (calibration) target flags for SDSS-I and SDSS-II Legacy survey

special_target1.name: special_target1
special_target1.description: Primary (science) target flags for SDSS-I and SDSS-II special program targets

special_target2.name: special_target2
special_target2.description: Secondary (calibration) target flags for SDSS-I and SDSS-II special program targets

segue1_target1.name: segue1_target1
segue1_target1.description: Primary (science) target flags for SEGUE-1 targets

segue1_target2.name: segue1_target2
segue1_target2.description: Secondary (calibration) target flags for SEGUE-1 targets

segue2_target1.name: segue2_target1
segue2_target1.description: Primary (science) target flags for SEGUE-2 targets

segue2_target2.name: segue2_target2
segue2_target2.description: Secondary (calibration) target flags for SEGUE-2 targets

boss_target1.name: boss_target1
boss_target1.description: Primary (science) target flags for BOSS targets

eboss_target0.name: eboss_target0
eboss_target0.description: SEQUELS, TDSS and SPIDERS target selection flags

eboss_target1.name: eboss_target1
eboss_target1.description: eBOSS, TDSS and SPIDERS target selection flags for main eBOSS survey

eboss_target2.name: eboss_target2
eboss_target2.description: eBOSS, TDSS and SPIDERS target selection flags for main eBOSS survey

eboss_target_id.name: eboss_target_id
eboss_target_id.description: eBOSS unique target identifier for every spectroscopic target

ancillary_target1.name: ancillary_target1
ancillary_target1.description: Target flags for BOSS ancillary targets

ancillary_target2.name: ancillary_target2
ancillary_target2.description: More target flags for BOSS ancillary targets

thing_id_targeting.name: thing_id_targeting
thing_id_targeting.description: Resolve THING_ID in SDSS imaging for targeted object

thing_id.name: thing_id
thing_id.description: Resolve THING_ID in SDSS imaging for best positional match

primtarget.name: primtarget
primtarget.description: Deprecated version of primary (science) target flags (meanings highly overloaded)

sectarget.name: sectarget
sectarget.description: Deprecated version of secondary (calibration) target flags (meanings highly overloaded)

sourcetype.name: sourcetype
sourcetype.description: String expressing type of source (similar to OBJTYPE in DR8 and earlier)

cx.name: cx
cx.description: Position of object on J2000 unit sphere

cy.name: cy
cy.description: Position of object on J2000 unit sphere

cz.name: cz
cz.description: Position of object on J2000 unit sphere

lambdaeff.name: lambdaeff
lambdaeff.description: Effective wavelength drilling position was optimized for

bluefiber.name: bluefiber
bluefiber.description: Set to 1 if this was requested to be a "blue fiber" target, 0 if it was a "red fiber" (in BOSS high redshift LRGs are requested to be on red fibers)

zoffset.name: zoffset
zoffset.description: Washer thickness used (for backstopping BOSS quasar targets, so they are closer to 4000 Angstrom focal plan)

zwarning.name: zwarning
zwarning.description: Bitmask of spectroscopic warning values; 0 means everything is OK

dof.name: dof
dof.description: Number of degrees of freedom in best fit

rchi2diff.name: rchi2diff
rchi2diff.description: Difference in reduced chi-squared between best and second best fit

z_noqso.name: z_noqso
z_noqso.description: Best redshift when ignoring QSO fits, recommended for BOSS CMASS and LOWZ targets; calculated only for survey='boss' spectra, not for any SDSS spectrograph data

zwarning_noqso.name: zwarning_noqso
zwarning_noqso.description: For Z_NOQSO redshift, the bitmask of spectroscopic warning values; 0 means everything is OK

rchi2diff_noqso.name: rchi2diff_noqso
rchi2diff_noqso.description: Difference in reduced chi-squared between best and second best fit for Z_NOQSO redshift

class_person.name: class_person
class_person.description: Visual-inspection classification (0=not inspected or unknown, 1=star, 2=narrow emission-line galaxy, 3=QSO, 4=galaxy)

tfile.name: tfile
tfile.description: File that best fit template comes from in idlspec1d product

tcolumn_0.name: tcolumn_0
tcolumn_0.description: Which column of the template file corresponds to template #0

tcolumn_1.description: Which column of the template file corresponds to template #1

npoly.description: Number of polynomial terms in fit

theta_9.description: Template coefficients of best fit (polynomial term #9)

veldispz.name: veldispz
veldispz.description: Redshift associated with best-fit velocity dispersion

veldispzerr.description: Error in redshift associated with best-fit velocity dispersion

veldispdof.description: Number of degrees of freedom in velocity dispersion fit

wcoverage.description: Coverage in wavelength, in units of log10 wavelength

snmedian_u.name: snmedian_u
snmedian_u.description: Median signal-to-noise per pixel within the u bandpass

snmedian_g.description: Median signal-to-noise per pixel within the g bandpass

snmedian.name: snmedian
snmedian.description: Median signal-to-noise per pixel across full spectrum (aka SN_MEDIAN_ALL)

chi68p.name: chi68p
chi68p.description: 68-th percentile value of abs(chi) of the best-fit synthetic spectrum to the actual spectrum (around 1.0 for a good fit)

anyandmask.name: anyandmask
anyandmask.description: For each bit, records whether any pixel in the spectrum has that bit set in its ANDMASK

anyormask.name: anyormask
anyormask.description: For each bit, records whether any pixel in the spectrum has that bit set in its ORMASK

platesn2.name: platesn2
platesn2.description: Overall signal-to-noise-squared measure for plate (only for SDSS spectrograph plates)

deredsn2.name: deredsn2
deredsn2.description: Dereddened overall signal-to-noise-squared measure for plate (only for BOSS spectrograph plates)

snturnoff.name: snturnoff
snturnoff.description: Signal to noise measure for MS turnoff stars on plate (-9999 if not appropriate)

sn1_g.name: sn1_g
sn1_g.description: Signal-to-noise squared for spectrograph #1, at fiducial (psf)magnitude g=20.20 for SDSS spectrograph spectra, g=21.20 for BOSS spectrograph spectra

sn1_r.name: sn1_r
sn1_r.description: Signal-to-noise squared for spectrograph #1, at fiducial (psf)magnitude r=20.25 for SDSS spectrograph spectra, r=20.20 for BOSS spectrograph spectra

sn1_i.name: sn1_i
sn1_i.description: Signal-to-noise squared for spectrograph #1, at fiducial (psf)magnitude i=19.90 for SDSS spectrograph spectra, i=20.20 for BOSS spectrograph spectra

sn2_g.name: sn2_g
sn2_g.description: Signal-to-noise squared for spectrograph #2, at fiducial (psf)magnitude g=20.20 for SDSS spectrograph spectra, g=21.20 for BOSS spectrograph spectra

sn2_r.name: sn2_r
sn2_r.description: Signal-to-noise squared for spectrograph #2, at fiducial (psf)magnitude r=20.25 for SDSS spectrograph spectra, r=20.20 for BOSS spectrograph spectra

sn2_i.name: sn2_i
sn2_i.description: Signal-to-noise squared for spectrograph #2, at fiducial (psf)magnitude i=19.90 for SDSS spectrograph spectra, i=20.20 for BOSS spectrograph spectra

elodiefilename.name: elodiefilename
elodiefilename.description: File name for best-fit ELODIE star

elodiezerr.name: elodiezerr
elodiezerr.description: Error in redshift fit to ELODIE star

elodiezmodelerr.name: elodiezmodelerr
elodiezmodelerr.description: Standard deviation in redshift among the 12 best-fit ELODIE stars

elodierchi2.name: elodierchi2
elodierchi2.description: Reduced chi-squared of fit to best ELODIE star

elodiedof.name: elodiedof
elodiedof.description: Degrees of freedom in fit to best ELODIE star
